author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

Update of L1T menu in TSG GTs (tag name: [`L1Menu_Collisions2022_v1_3_0-d1_xml`](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/tags/L1Menu_Collisions2022_v1_3_0-d1_xml)) [[documented in CMSLITDPG-980]](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSLITDPG-980?focusedCommentId=4451321&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels%3Acomment-tabpanel#comment-4451321).

#### PR validation:

`addOnTests.py --test=hlt_mc_GRun` passed.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

`12_4_X`
title: Update of L1T menu in TSG GTs to `L1Menu_Collisions2022_v1_3_0-d1_xml`
